body.name: 5MP Outdoor Security Camera Dual Lens, 2.4G/5Ghz WIFI Camera for Home Security, 360°PTZ Surveillance Camera with Motion Detection Tracking/Siren/2-Way Audio/Color Night Vision/Spotlight/Waterproof
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 41 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 11 mins
features: 【Upgraded Dual Lens & Dual Screen & 8X Zoom】 The security camera designed with 2 lens, which can see 2 screen on the APP. The up one is wide-angle lens(fixed position) to see the panorama pic, the other one is PTZ camera to see the close up images (rotate 350°pan/ 90°tilt). you can click the screen to control in 8X zoom to help you record clear video both near/far positions. Note: Wired, need to be plugged into an adapter for power.(include)

【2.4/5GHz Dual Band WiFi & 360°Coverage】This Outdoor security camera support both 2.4G&5GHz WiFi, which is faster and more stable signal to offer smoother images and live video for you. 360 PTZ camera support 355°horizontal and 90°vertical rotation, monitoring with no dead angle. suitable for outdoor and indoor.

【5MP HD Image & Full-Color Night Vision】The Camera for home security outside provide 5MP(3MP+2MP) full HD clearer images and video at day and night. Equipped with white lamp and infrared lamp, 3 night vision modes(Full-color/infrared /smart vision) for you to switch freely, the light automatically turns on when ambient light insufficient to offer clear and color images, the best night vision distance up to 65ft. Note: one Len is 2MP Resolution, the other is 3MP, which is 2MP+3MP=5MP.

【Motion Detection & Humanoid Tracking & Smart Alerts】 With intelligent AI algorithm, this surveillance camera support motion detection/humanoid tracking. Home security camera will auto-track the object movements when a human motion detects. Real-time notifications will be sent on your phone app immediately and you can open light and Siren to scare away uninvited guest. Supports drawing detection areas to protect your privacy.

【Two-way Audio & Micro SD Card/Cloud Storage & Waterproof】Built-in microphone and speaker, the outdoor camera support two-way intercom with your family or visitor, and it allows multi-person to see live video by sharing the device. Support cloud storage (need to pay) to or add a TF card (not included, up to 128GB ) to preserve video, playback important moment anytime. IP66 waterproof, WIFI security camera will work even in extreme weather conditions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2.4G/5G Dual lens Outdoor Security Camera, A Perfect Christmas Birthday Gifts for yourself/Friends/Parents/Family/Girl Friend! With VERYHDSN upgrade dual lens home security camera, you don’t worry about property lost and inability of baby, elderly people, pets care! Keep an eye on your home and family safety anytime anywhere! Why Choose Our 2.4G/5G WIFI Security Camera Outdoor for Home? Dual-Lens with Dual Screen, 3.6mm（Fixed Len） + 8mm (PTZ Len) Dual lens camera system.Support 2.4Ghz/5Ghz Dual Band WIFI Connection and LAN Connection, much faster and more stable. 8X digital Zoom for viewing more details.360° Coverage, 350° Pan, 90° Tilt create PTZ all round coverage for your home.Support cruise mode setting. (vertical cruise/Horizontal cruise/Fixed point cruise)5MP(2MP + 3MP) HD Resolution to view clear images and video. 2MP(1920*1080), 3MP(2304*1296).Multi-Users Sharing & Two-way Audio, built-in Mic and speaker offer you smooth talk with your family or friends.Dual Storage, support TF card storage up to 128GB(Not included) and cloud Storage(need to pay).APP control, Support remote control on your IOS or Android device.Support motion detection, humanoid Tracking, real-time alert, support draw detection area to protect privacy.IP66 Waterproof, use for Outdoor/indoor.3 Night Vision function, IR/Full-color/Smart night vision. Note: This camera has two Lens, one is 2MP Resolution, the other is 3MP, which is 2MP+3MP=5MP.

Please Note Before Use the Outdoor Camera: The WIFI camera need to use the power cord and adapter.(include)If use the TF card to storage, please insert it in the card slot first before use the camera, or it will not work, if there is an error reported, please format the memory card.Due to signal problems, real-time picture and video may be delayed somtimes.Pixels can be adjusted from HD to Ultra HD.Motion detection/human tracking function/light Function/alarm need to set by self. the detection sensitivity can set. But If can't detect or tracking, please set the sensitivity to maximum. The message notification function can also be turned on/off.For faster connection, please close to the camera and put the product in place with a strong WI-FI signal for testing.If you cannot connect, reset the probe needle and try connecting again. Only the voice is heard, the camera will reset successfully. or please be free to link us, we will be here to help you.

Motion Detection & Humanoid Tracking & Real-time Alert Motion Detection: The security camera can identify human/car/pet and other moving objects.Humanoid Tracking: It can smartly track the human movement and record it. You can check what happened in your home even when you’re not there.Alarm & Real-time Alert: when detected the human moving, you will receive the notification on APP. You can set the light function or turn on siren to scare off intruders.

Multi-user Sharing: The home cameras allows multiple users to access it at the same time, so you can watch the monitored footage with your family.Two-way Audio: With the built-in microphone and speaker, you can talk not only to the mailman but also to your family at any time, without having to face each other. Packing List: 1 * Outdoor Camera1 * English Manual1 * Adapter1 * Screw Bag

Three Night Vision Modes: Full Colour Mode: the LEDs work continuously during the day and night to provide a clearer picture.Infrared Mode: provides standard surveillance during the day and infrared video at night.Smart Mode: provides standard surveillance during the day and the LED light will automatically turn on at night when an event is detected. (Need user to set )

IP66 Weatherproof This WIFI camera is built tough enough to sustain rain, snow, heat, and cold. Give you the best protection. Storage & Playback Outdoor Camera supports cloud (need to pay )and TF card (not included) for local storage, event logging that can be played back at any time without losing essential details. Personalized Activity Area Customize the area for inspection to make it suitable for your home. Focus on prominent areas and reduce unnecessary alerts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peace of Mind !
reviews.reviewText: This security camera has been the perfect edition to our family home. With multiple points of access to our home, the camera puts our minds at ease when we are away. With dual cameras and the swivel action of the main point of view, you are able to see anyone of anything within a comfortable radius. We definitely feel safer with this camera on our security team !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like this Dual lens Camera!!!
reviews.reviewText: The camera have two lens, one is fixed len, other is PTZ camera, so I can view panoramic images, then control the PTZ camera to patrol an area. Amazing design, it have motion detection and auto tracking function, if detect the movement, it can open sire and light to drive away intruders, NICE camera!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars every moment is on air
reviews.reviewText: This product is great, when you are not at home, it instantly notifies your phone of all movements with its motion detection sensor and now you can leave your home safely: I like this product very much and recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dual security camera!
reviews.reviewText: It has a fixed camera and pan tilt camera, This means you can point the fixed lens on the garage or front door, then use the ptz camera to to keep an eye on multiple areas to protect your home. One device=two camera.This camera support 2.4g&5ghz WIFI connection, or use power over ethernet. It needs to be plugged in for power, NOT wireless. In general, it works well and value for money!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price, Can't beat the price!!
reviews.reviewText: At first I didn't believe that I could buy a good quality product at such a cheap price, I originally had the idea of trying it, the result exceeded my expectation. Easy to set, I use a 128 GB memory card and did not buy the cloud service, it can record clear audio. video quality is good and the night vision function works well. In short, The price can't be beat for all the features.
Works good for my car dashcam handy to have external storage and also got it cheaper price then other similar product. Easy to use.
"The 64GB SD card I purchased is a gem! It offers a generous storage capacity, fast read and write speeds, and works seamlessly with all my devices. It's a purchase I absolutely don't regret!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Hard to beat for the price
reviews.reviewText: Works well in a raspberry pi. Fairly inexpensive
Love the deal I got on this! At Walmart this is like 65.00. What a savings
